verbs.description: arnold kopelson oscar [V: winning] [ARG0: producer] of ‘ platoon’ and ‘ the fugitive ’ dies at 83 arnold kopelson the oscar - winning producer of such films as platoon and the fugitive died monday at his home in beverly hills he was 83 kopelson death was confirmed monday his wife and business partner of 42 years anne kopelson anne kopelson said her husband was a consummate producer who dedicated himself wholeheartedly to every film he produced over his long career he loved what he did kopelson told variety shari redstone producer sumner redstone oscar beverly hills arnold arnold kopelson cbs the fugitive 1993 film the fugitive cbs corp anne cbs corporation
